name: Purchase Transaction Non Existent Payment Account
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - https://fargate.test.payall.com/v1/acquiring/process

raw 
  {
  "program_id": "1b1476f8-3b30-4e94-8b8b-e7b312e6d5c8",
  "merchant_id": "016fd8c3-f677-a782-122d-2b55e30c93ce",
  "type": "PURCHASE",
  "amount": 12.5,
  "currency_code": "MDL",
  "reference": "da040abf-314c-41fd-b556-2b1b8a5c9266TEST",
  "stored_payment_instrument": null,
  "payment_instrument": {
    "holder_name": "Donald Kuvalis TEST",
    "number": "6011208701112222",
    "expiration_date": "2022-04",
    "security_code": "123",
    "billing": {
      "address": {
        "country_code": "USA",
        "country_subdivision_code": "USA-TN",
        "city": "Chattanooga",
        "postal_code": "37402",
        "line1": "1234 East Main Street.",
        "line2": "Suite 1000."
      }
    }
  }
}

Response:

400 - Bad Request 

  {"error":{"code":"PAYMENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND","message":"PAYMENT_ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND","errors":null}}
